name: MulSemiringAction.toRingEquiv_apply
initialProofState:
G : Type u_1
inst✝² : Group G
R : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction G R
x : G
a✝ : R
⊢ Eq ((MulSemiringAction.toRingEquiv G R x) a✝) (HSMul.hSMul x a✝)

name: MulSemiringAction.toRingEquiv_symm_apply
initialProofState:
G : Type u_1
inst✝² : Group G
R : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : MulSemiringAction G R
x : G
a✝ : R
⊢ Eq ((MulSemiringAction.toRingEquiv G R x).symm a✝) (HSMul.hSMul (Inv.inv x) a✝)
